Yes! I am so happy that the Catalan brewery repoened its doors to the public. The space is phenomenal (2 floors) and boasts some of the best cañas and tapas menus in town. The best part is that the prices are for locals and the place is right near the University which makes the crowd diverse and the atmosphere fun. If you dont know what to order your first time here is a tip, the mini frankfurt comes with a caña. Deliciosa.
